are purely clerical in nature; 2) clarify the specific duties of a pharmacy technician; 3) clarify pharmacist supervision of a technician; and 4) establish the specific functions of a pharmacy technician by statute versus by administrative rule. Pharmacy technicians play an important role in the pharmacy setting by handling a

an important role in the pharmacy setting by handling a range of tasks that allow pharmacists to focus on more complex responsibilities like patient consultations and clinical services.
